text: @BenJolly9 @georgegalloway How long do you want to stay in lockdown for, forever? The figures are inflated, as everyone who has died in the last few weeks they have counted as covid19. Monetary incentive to do so. You need to look at the bigger picture of what the agenda is then you might think differently

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
